english: This disease causes muscle pain and rashes .
chinese: 此病可引起肌肉疼和皮疹。

english: Her hands have broken out in a rash .
chinese: 她双手忽然出满了皮疹。

english: His face broke out in a rash .
chinese: 他的脸上突然长满了皮疹。

english: An atropine rash is more likely to occur in children .
chinese: 阿托品皮疹似乎更易发生于儿童。

english: Has your rash cleared up yet ?

chinese: 皮疹造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Scratching can actually trigger eczematous rashes
chinese: 抓挠事实上可以引起湿疹性的皮疹。

english: The rash is characterized by a " sandpaper " texture
chinese: 该种皮疹的特点是患处皮肤粗糙。

english: Some people develop skin rashes when they take sulfas
chinese: 有些人服用磺胺药物后会出现皮疹

english: L get rashes . simple chores bother me
chinese: 我得了皮疹。简单的家务事困扰着我

english: L get rashes . simple chores bother me
chinese: 我得了皮疹。简单的家务事困扰着我

english: Some people develop skin rashes when they take sulfas
chinese: 有些人服用磺胺药物后会出现皮疹。

english: As it fades , it may peel off in small flakes
chinese: 当皮疹消退时，出现脱屑。

english: Recurrent fever with rash and painful joint
chinese: 反复发热伴皮疹和关节肿痛

english: Hot weather makes her come out in a rash
chinese: 因天气炎热，她起了皮疹。

english: Ever had a really bad rash on your lower body
